thread.title: Helen

author: Helen
title: Helen
text: I ordered thigh-high compression stockings and product said it came in Petite with an extra charge plus I wanted the wider width - another extra change. Okay, no problem. Received confirmation. Received another email saying product DID NOT come in wider width even though product description said it did with added costs. Still don't have but waiting for another email
